explain.en: n. a person who spends money in a careless or wasteful way
n. broker, dealer —usually used in combination
n. a person who has committed a crime or done something wrong
n. a person who is in charge of the things in a museum, zoo, etc.
n. a person who makes speeches and is very good at making them
n. someone or something that is getting started in a new activity
n. a person who has negative opinions about other people and about the things people do; especially : a person who believes that people are selfish and are only interested in helping themselves
n. a quixotic person
n. someone who holds the belief that a country should grow larger
n. the people who can vote in an election
n. someone who works to preserve something (such as a building or an area of land)
n. a person who has very strong feelings about something (such as religion or politics) and who wants other people to have those feelings : a zealous person
n. someone who believes in and supports for ideas that are very far from what most people consider correct or reasonable
n. someone who supports ideas and beliefs that differ from and try to change accepted ideas and beliefs especially in a way that is seen as wrong or dishonest
n. a great personage : magnate
n. a teacher or guide that you trust
n. a person who has a lot of experience in or knowledge about a particular subject
n. a very wealthy and powerful business person
n. someone or something that leads others or shows what will happen in the future
n. a person who believes that something is very important and should be done or followed all the time
adj. strongly or fanatically determined or devoted
n. a person who is not famous or important
n. a person who deceives others by pretending to be someone else
n. a person who plans and organizes something
n. a person who criticizes or opposes beliefs and practices that are widely accepted
explain.derive: iconoclastic adj. 反传统的，反崇拜的

explain.en: n. a person who predicts the future by magical, intuitive, or more rational means
n. a person who knows a lot about something (such as art, wine, food, etc.) : an expert in a particular subject
n. a rude and rough person
n. a person who writes plays
n. a ruler who has total power and who often uses that power in cruel and unfair ways
n. one who speaks or writes in defense of someone or something
n. a person who wastes time, money, etc.
n. a person who rules with total power
n. the use of tricks especially to hide, avoid, or get something
n. one that causes boredom
n. a member of the laity
n. a person who is no longer popular or successful
n. precursor, originator
n. someone who helps another person, group, etc., by giving money
n. the unfair practice by a powerful person (such as a politician) of giving jobs and other favors to friends
n. the unfair practice by a powerful person of giving jobs and other favors to relatives
n. centralized control by an autocratic authority
n. the belief that a morally good action is one that helps the greatest number of people
n. cynical beliefs : beliefs that people are generally selfish and dishonest
n. the belief that your country, race, etc., is better than any other
n. a belief in human equality especially with respect to social, political, and economic affairs
n. the quality or behavior of a person who accepts what happens without complaining or showing emotion
n. feelings and behavior that show a desire to help other people and a lack of selfishness
n. a belief that government and laws are not necessary
n. considering human beings as the most significant entity of the universe
n. a disbelief in the existence of deity
n. a political or economic system in which the government owns businesses, land, etc.
n. the idea or belief that everything has two opposite parts or principles
n. a theory or practice (as of medicine or psychotherapy) that combines doctrines or methods (as therapeutic procedures) from diverse sources
n. the practice of relying on observation and experiment especially in the natural sciences
n. the belief that men and women should have equal rights and opportunities
n. the belief that pleasure or happiness is the most important goal in life
n. the attitude of a person who believes that it is possible to live according to very high standards of behavior and honesty
n. an interpretation of what is not human or personal in terms of human or personal characteristics
n. the actions or attitudes of a person who does things without being concerned about what other people will think
n. the belief that traditional morals, ideas, beliefs, etc., have no worth or value
n. an attitude of doubting the truth of something (such as a claim or statement)
n. the principle or practice of complete abstinence from alcoholic drinks
n. blood, especially clotted blook
n. gruesomeness depicted in vivid detail
adj. left uncultivated or unplanted
adj. hard to control, restrain, or keep in order
explain.cn: 不服管理的，难以控制的

explain.en: adj. presenting a general view or summary
n. a strong belief
n. a convicting or being convicted
n. property that is given to somebody when their father dies
adj. felt or experienced by watching or reading about somebody else doing something, rather than by doing it yourself"
adj. capable of being readily persuaded or influenced; tractable
adj. easily molded or shaped; malleable
adj. very sorrowful or sad
adj. old-fashioned and no longer suitable for modern conditions
adj. following one's own capricious, wanton, or depraved inclinations
adj. following no clear principle or law
adj. moving about aimlessly or irregularly
adj. behaving wrongly
v. to draw on as a major source
explain.cn: 采用... 作为主要来源

explain.en: v. to deprive of vital elements or resources, such as personnel, equipment, or funding, for use elsewhere:
explain.cn: 剥夺（关键成分用于别处）

explain.en: adj. being at variance : disagreeing
adj. disagreeable in sound; harsh or dissonant.
v. to introduce (as an idea) gradually or in a subtle, indirect, or covert
v. to introduce (as oneself) by stealthy, smooth, or artful means
adj. stealthy, furtive, and sneaking
v. to bring into harmony
v. to talk or act with noisy swaggering threats
n. Loud, arrogant speech, often full of empty threats
adj. lacking intelligible meaning
adj. foolish; absurd
v. to make a hole in; hollow out
adj. appropriate to a villain, as in wickedness or depravity
n. tedious, menial, or unpleasant work
n. a heavy weight; a burden
n. an unfounded or false, deliberately misleading story
n. an expression of approval; praise
v. to praise or honor
n. honor and glory won for great achievement
v. to honor, especially with an award or a prize
v. to utter in a shrill manner; scream
v. to read or glance through (a book, for example) quickly or superficially
n. a strong desire for money or possessions
v. to bring into conformity or agreement
n. a deserter from one faith, cause, or allegiance to another
n. one who hates or mistrusts humankind
explain.cn: 厌恶人类的人，愤世嫉俗的人

explain.en: n. the act of making equal or uniform
v. to be on both sides of; extend over or across
v. to appear to favor both sides of an issue
adj. portending evil; ominous
adj. harmful or malignant in intent or effect
v. if someone shelves a plan or project, they decide not to continue with it, either for a while or permanently
v. to write or draw in a hurried, careless way
n. a very dangerous or frightening situation
adj. strikingly impressive especially in beauty or excellence
adj. causing astonishment or disbelief
explain.cn: 令人吃惊的，出乎意料的

explain.en: adj. steadfast in loyalty or principle
adj. not limited or restricted; unrestrained
n. a wall or embankment raised as a defensive fortification; a rampart
v. to provide defense or protection for
v. to display prominently, especially to advantage
adj. changing or tending to change; variable
n. a long, monotonous harangue or piece of writing
explain.cn: 冗长，单调的说话或者文章

explain.en: n. great astonishment or consternation
adj. bitterly scathing; caustic
adj. (of somebody's words) sounding important but having little meaning and used to impress people
adj. characteristic of or resembling a wag; jocular or witty
v. to take back; disavow
v. to impress, delineate, or imprint clearly
adj. marked by great joy or jubilation; triumphant
